s:workflowdescription.description: An example workflow demonstrating the RNA-seq analysis described in the Nature Protocols article ?Differential gene and transcript expression analysis of RNA-seq experiments with TopHat and Cufflinks? (http://www.nature.com/nprot/journal/v7/n3/full/nprot.2012.016.html).
s:workflowdescription.author: guest
s:workflowdescription.title: RNA-Seq Example with TopHat and Cufflinks

s:processor.name: tophat-lonestar
s:processor.s:description: "TopHat, TopHat is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads."

s:processor.s:description: "Cufflinks 1.2.1, Transcript assembly, differential expression, and differential regulation for RNA-Seq"

s:processor.name: cuffmerge-lonestar
s:processor.s:description: "Cuffmerge 1.2.1, Cufflinks includes a script called cuffmerge that you can use to merge together several Cufflinks assemblies."

s:processor.name: cuffdiff-lonestar
s:processor.s:description: "Cuffdiff 1.2.1, Cufflinks includes a program, Cuffdiff, that you can use to find significant changes in transcript expression, splicing, and promoter use."
